 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמֵּר‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el denominative** ==bind sheaves== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Ps.129.7|Ps 129:7]], compare Christian-Palestinian Aramaic [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 69</sup>); — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעַמֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.129.7|Ps 129:7]] (in simile; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺצֵר‎</span>). 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַר‎</span>] **verb Hithpa\`el** ==deal tyrannically== with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cherish enmity, rancour, malice***, III. ***plunge*** into a conflict, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rancour, malice***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעַמֶּרֿ‎</span> consecutive [[Deut.24.7|Deut 24:7]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַמֵּר‎</span> [[Deut.21.14|Deut 21:14]].
